util

Class StringConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.StringConverter

  • public class StringConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Converts a list of elements into a string using the different arguments of the method. The default separator is ", ".
    Author:
    Tomas

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StringConverter() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> java.lang.String stringfyList(java.util.List<T> list)
      Returns a string with all the elements converted into String and separated with the DEFAULT_SEPARATOR.
      static <T> java.lang.String stringfyList(java.util.List<T> list, java.lang.String enclosing)
      Returns a string with all the elements converted into String and surrounded with the given enclosing and separated with the DEFAULT_SEPARATOR.
      static <T> java.lang.String stringfyList(java.util.List<T> list, java.lang.String preItem, java.lang.String postItem)
      Returns a string with all the elements converted into String with preItem before them and postItem after them, and separated with the DEFAULT_SEPARATOR.
      static <T> java.lang.String stringfyList(java.util.List<T> list, java.lang.String separator, java.lang.String preItem, java.lang.String postItem)
      Returns a string with all the elements converted into String with preItem before them and postItem after them, and separated with the given separator.
      static <T> java.lang.String stringfyList(java.util.List<T> list, java.lang.String separator, java.lang.String preItem, java.lang.String postItem, Function<T,java.lang.String> function)
      Returns a string with all the elements converted into String using the function received, with preItem before them and postItem after them, and separated with the given separator.
      static java.lang.String stringfySet(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> set, java.lang.String enclosing)
      Returns a string with all the elements converted into String and surrounded with the given enclosing and separated with the DEFAULT_SEPARATOR.
